articles.title: General Internal Medicine Shared Admissions Workload 2022
General Medical Admissions Workload 2022 and Specialist Adequacy
articles.description:
***Curated by Dr Saiful Safuan Md Sani***
_MRCP(London) MRCP(UK) MA(Cantab) MBBS(London)_
_Consultant Physician (Acute Internal Medicine)_
articles.contents:
Workload should dictate amount of manpower.

CAUTION: fair distribution requires consideration and information on:
 1. outpatient clinic volume,
 2. daycare volume,
 3. procedure volume,
 4. referral workload,
 5. fulfilling demands for up-to-date treatment provided by a subspecialty.
